_source.text: 2) In the multipost page (created with the JUGGLEDAD's multicolumn/custom query template) the Kicker area must appear with an image if the custom field are setted to OK or blank (if disappear ... is better) if the field are setted to NO.

text: Kicker **area** must appear with an **image** if the **custom** field are setted to OK or blank (if disappear ... **is** **better**) if the field are setted to NO.
